page.title: 04PEOPLE'S PARK/POPES MEADOW
page.content: People's Park is bigger than Pope's Meadow. In People's Park they have lots of green trees and it has swings, see-saws and a roundabout for the children to play on. Pope's Meadow does not have a playground, it is a little park where children can play. Pope's Meadow does not have a lot of trees to shelter from the sun. Each of the parks has a changing room where the boys get changed and they have football posts. Our school, Richmond Hill, is just on top of Pope's Meadow. In the winter our school goes sledging with some teachers. In the summer some of the boys go cross country running around the parks.
